title: Does technology shape us, or is it us, our culture, and society that shaped technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Symbiotic relationship, the innovators are not known until they can sell their product. Some people want things that other people will never spend the time or money for. I am not a gamer since the time I lost 8/4 to a game of Astroids in the 1970s.
There is an incomprehensibly complex interaction between all of the above. Volumes could be written and the whole would still be a mystery.
